Text: all your tv torrents moved to appropriate category. please upload to Video > Highres TV shows when applicable

Just a suggestion, but if you are going to post a full season put them all in a folder(Supernatural S01.720p.HDTV.x264) and make one upload which will take you less time and make it easier on the downloaders who can then pick and choose. Thanks for the upload and long live those who post  because everyone can post something.

@rob2012: You will have to make an actual physical copy of all the files into the new folder and make one new torrent of said folder. That will require more hard drive space if you want to keep seeding the individual files that have already been uploaded.  There is nothing special required except the above. Good luck.
